ygData.subject: OT: Interest Inquiry
ygData.msgSnippet: I was wondering how many people would be interested in participating in a scenario of the month contest.  The idea is somebody picks a theme and participants

I was wondering how many people would be interested in 
participating in a scenario of the month contest.  The idea is 
somebody picks a theme and participants design a scenario within a 
month's time around that theme.  At the end of the month, we'd use a 
poll to vote on the best scenario around picked theme for the month.

If there is enough interest, it would be a group decision on the theme 
of the month unless somebody else has a better way to pick the theme.
